name: Recurly
description: Integrate with Recurly to list, list, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Accounts
tools.description: List accounts (customers) in Recurly. Optionally filter by state or email. Returns account codes, emails, and statuses.

tools.name: List Subscriptions
tools.description: List subscriptions in Recurly. Optionally filter by state or plan. Returns subscription IDs, plans, statuses, and amounts.

tools.name: List Invoices
tools.description: List invoices in Recurly. Optionally filter by state or type. Returns invoice numbers, amounts, and statuses.

tools.name: Get Account
tools.description: Retrieve details of a single Recurly account by its ID or code. Returns account name, email, state, and billing info.

tools.name: List Plans
tools.description: List subscription plans in Recurly. Returns plan names, codes, pricing, and statuses.
